sentence: Kent picked up an early endorsement in his bid to oust Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler, one of the 10 GOP members of Congress who voted for Trump's second impeachment.
title: Tracking Trump's endorsements in the 2022 midterm election

sentence: But with his eye on supporting candidates Trump has attacked, Hogan has headlined or will headline fund-raisers for lawmakers like Senator Lisa Murkowski, Republican of Alaska, who voted to convict Trump on an impeachment charge; Representative Jaime Herrera Beutler, Republican of Washington, who voted to impeach Trump; and Kemp, whom Trump has slammed as very weak.? Hogan's advocacy organization has begun running ads for Representative David Valadao, Republican of California, who also voted to impeach Trump after Jan. 6.
title: Tucker, Thiel and Trump: How J.D. Vance won in Ohio.
